attributes.action:
Introduce emergency immigration and border controls prior to 
leaving the EU
attributes.background: We have seen record levels of unsustainable immigration from the EU in recent years. There is nothing to suggest that those seeking to exploit free movement, will do so prior to Brexit

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what changes you would like to be made to immigration rules and border controls before the UK leaves the EU. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
